channel.title: In need of some advice/opinions
channel.description:
First of all, if this is the wrong section I'm sorry.
Anyways, I'm considering developing a server, and I need some advice or opinions.
The bases I will most likely use are:
Hyperion Emulous Shard
What are the pro's and con's of each and which would you prefer I use?
I am grateful for any input so it can be little details as well.
